name: Crypt Climber
description:
ATTENTION - PRESS F1 TO CHANGE GAME SPEED DEPENDING ON COMPUTER
HOWEVER, FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE .EXE

Crypt Climber

Controls: WASD or ARROW KEYS

  • Play as a vampire climbing out of a haunted crypt
  • Double jump to turn into a bat and boost into the sky
  • Don't get caught by the light which is chasing you from the bottom
  • Collect candies and move upwards to increase your score

Credits:

  • Jordan Guillou - Programmer
  • José Luis Amores - Musician
  • Sergey Martynenko - Artist
